name: Dodging Fake News With Donald Trump
detailed_description:
The media is giving Donald Trump a run for his money. They have set up a full on barrage of comments that he needs help dodging. In Dodging Fake News With Donald Trump you will use click timing to keep him out of harms way. If you fall off of trumps podium you lose and if you are hit by a newspaper article block you lose. The goal is to last as long as you can while trying to beat your previous top time. You can also collect yellow ego blocks simply to keep track of how much ego Trump has. It's time to dodge some hate, pull up a mouse and get to saving Trump.

Features:

Easy 1 Click Control
Multiple Ways To Lose
Best Time Tracker
Ego Tracker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
